nodes.text: The H-5 70 Mining Facility was a space station in the Bright Jewel system. It was home to the Dynath Miners, allies of the Car'das. During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station, Black Sun pirates targeted Dynathian transports in the Masul'ivis Asteroid Belt. Car'das starfighters dispatched by Laetin A'shera finally repelled Black Sun forces and escorted Dynathian ships safely back to the H-5 70 Mining Facility.
